H0.text: Binoculars are the best tool for Jessica to use to see the cells in an oak tree leaf.

H1.text: Microscope is the best tool for Jessica to use to see the cells in an oak tree leaf.

H2.text: Reading glasses are the best tool for Jessica to use to see the cells in an oak tree leaf.

H3.text: A magnifying glass is the best tool for Jessica to use to see the cells in an oak tree leaf.

A4.text: A microscope is a laboratory instrument used to examine objects that are too small to be seen by the naked eye.
